responses: 0: Either no parties or only the governing party receives free access.
1: Some parties in addition to the governing party receive free access.
citation: Pemstein et al. (2018, V-Dem Working Paper Series 2018:21); V-Dem Codebook (see suggested citation at the top of this document).
question: In this national election, did parties or candidates receive either free or publicly financed access to national broadcast media?
name: v2elfrcamp, *_osp, *_ord
